masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Okay, DON'T PANIC, but your ex just showed up to your family's Christmas party. Yeah, the one whose parent is a SUPERVILLAIN. They're being weirdly nice. Your mom LOVES them. And they keep asking about your 'new friends.' This is either reconciliation or reconnaissance."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Figure out your ex's real intentions
  • Keep the family oblivious to the danger
  • Handle your complicated feelings about seeing them
